overview: The performance depicts Park Nam-ok's rough journey of making the movie "The Widow" while carrying a child on her back. It intersects Park Nam-ok's subjective and turbulent life where she did not lose her dream even in an environment where women's social activities were not easy, and the narrative of the only movie she left behind, shows the life and anguish of a human being ahead of her time in a three-dimensional world.
title: Apres Girl
